title: Living arts of Japan
brief_description: Visitors to Japan rarely have time or opportunity to examine closely the cultural activities shown in this film: from the measured dignity of the tea ceremony to the delicate brushwork of Japanese paintings, the perfection of lacquer-ware and the vigorous manufacture of wood block prints.
